lyrics_text:
Verse 1:
In the uplifting night, we find our way
One small step, then we sway
Heartbeats sync to pop dreams
Nothing’s ever as it seems

Chorus:
My Song, My Song
We rise with a uplifting glow
My Song, My Song
Let the whole world know

Verse 2:
Hold the line, don’t let it fade
Moments bright that we have made
From today into the new
I believe, and so do you

Bridge:
Breathe in… breathe out…
We’re not alone, we’re here right now

Chorus:
My Song, My Song
We rise with a uplifting glow
My Song, My Song
Let the whole world know
